name: 𝘼𝙪𝙩𝙤𝙋𝙞𝙘𝙓
description: AutoPicX is a Telethon based UserBot which helps you to change your profile pic in your desired time interval.

SESSION.description: Generate this value from @CatStringSessionBot in telegram

CHANNEL_ID.description: Place the ID of channel in which the pictures are saved to change your profile pic (Include -100 with ID)

TIME.description: After What Time Next Pic To Be Changed Place Time in Seconds Eg- 60 it means 1 minute
